subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant is taking on a playmaking role, and Steve Nash is accelerating his offensive game. With Pau Gasol coming off the bench, the Lakers beat the Thunder, 105-96.
snippet: Kobe Bryant is taking on a playmaking role, and Steve Nash is accelerating his offensive game. With Pau Gasol coming off the bench, the Lakers beat the Thunder, 105-96.
